title: The Best Games From the 2020 NFL Schedule  | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The NFL schedule was officially released, and it includes a coronavirus contingency plan to potentially push back the Super Bowl and add weeks to the back end of the season. We highlight the best games of the season, the Bucs' top matchups, and the teams with the most prime-time games.
Host: Kevin Clark
Host: Danny Kelly and Rodger Sherman

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
